game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family heirloom from the clutches of a mischievous bandit.
game.description: Lady Whimsy's prized possession, a precious gemstone necklace, has been pilfered by a sneaky thief. Your mission is to track down the thief and retrieve the stolen item.
game.reward: A chest containing 100 gold coins and a rare potion of healing

tasks.objective: Gather information about the thief's hideout
tasks.description: Visit the local tavern and speak with the patrons to gather clues about the thief's whereabouts.
Sneak into the thief's hideout, located in an abandoned windmill on the outskirts of town, and retrieve the stolen heirloom.

tasks.objective: Return to Lady Whimsy with the recovered heirloom
tasks.description: Return to Lady Whimsy's mansion and deliver the recovered gemstone necklace.
